Name: Dummy Life
About the game: In the far future, robots became part of humanity. Their purpose is to assist humans with various tasks from helping with daily chores to working in hazardous environments. But to develop such efficient and reliable robots, rigorous vetting of design was a necessity. This was the dawn of the Test Dummies. Created solely to test and perfect the duties these robots were to uphold in the near future. DUMMY LIFE is a science fiction hacking puzzle game. Play as CYPH3R, a test dummy that was recently activated to test a new hacking technology. Journey through beautifully crafted levels while overcoming obstacles as a Hacker. Manipulate devices such as surveillance cameras, security doors, moving platforms, pressure plates, teleporters, laser traps and other robots to assist you in your escape. Key features: 18 gameplay levels Hack into devices and use them to your advantage Hack into other test dummies to see what they are thinking Breathtaking Spacescapes Customizable appearances Hidden collectibles Third person and first person perspective
